About Us

Why choose P & M?

Welcome to P&M Improvements, your number one source for all home improvement projects. We're dedicated to providing you the very best service with an emphasis on customer satisfaction.


We are based in New Port Richey, Florida and serve the surrounding tri-county area of Pasco, Hillsborough and Pinellas.

Pasco, Hillsborough and Pinellas Home Improvement Services

We provide a full range of handyman services including:

  • Home Renovations
  • Bathroom/Kitchen Remodel
  • Drywall
  • Wood/Tile Flooring
  • Cabinet Installation
  • Door/Window Repair
  • Fencing
  • Interior/Exterior Painting
  • Pressure Washing
  • Junk/Trash Removal
